sentences.en: " Holding down the receiver,'said Daisy cynically.
sentences.cn: “ 挂上话筒在讲.”黛西冷嘲热讽地说.

sentences.en: "Typical!" Hattie slammed down the receiver. "Absolutely typical!"
sentences.cn: “果不其然！”哈蒂重重摔下听筒。“真是果不其然啊！”

sentences.en: a satellite receiver
sentences.cn: 卫星信号接收器

sentences.en: Auto-tuning VHF receivers are now common in cars.
sentences.cn: 自动调谐的超高频信号接收器现普遍使用在小汽车上。

sentences.en: Between July and September, a total of 1,059 firms called in the receiver.
sentences.cn: 7月到9月间，一共有1,059家公司破产在管。

sentences.en: For the opposite reason , AB is sometimes called the universal receiver.
sentences.cn: 相反, AB型血被称为万能受血者.

sentences.en: He hung up the receiver and went out.
sentences.cn: 他挂上电话听筒走了出去.

sentences.en: He snatched up the receiver and his free hand groped for the switch on the bedside lamp.
sentences.cn: 他一只手抓起电话听筒，另一只手去摸床头灯的开关。

sentences.en: He took up telephone receiver and began to dial.
sentences.cn: 他拿起电话听筒开始拨号码.

sentences.en: I dropped the receiver back in the cradle.
sentences.cn: 我把听筒放回听筒架上。

sentences.en: Molly's more of a giver than a receiver.
sentences.cn: 莫莉更乐于给予而不是接受。

sentences.en: Mr. Jones will act as receiver for the company that has failed in business.
sentences.cn: 琼斯先生将作为那个破产公司破产的清算管理人.

sentences.en: She picked up the receiver and dialled his number.
sentences.cn: 她拿起听筒，拨了他的电话号码。

sentences.en: That's a heterodyne receiver.
sentences.cn: 那是外差式接收机.

sentences.en: The business is in the hands of the receivers .
sentences.cn: 公司现在由破产管理人接管。

sentences.en: The line went dead. Whitlock replaced the receiver.
sentences.cn: 线路中断了，惠特洛克把听筒放回原处。

sentences.en: The radio receiver cut out.
sentences.cn: 无线电接收机突然停了.

sentences.en: The receiver and the quarterback are going to trade positions.
sentences.cn: 接球手与四分卫将会对换位置。

sentences.en: The smaller units are mounted directly on the receiver tank.
sentences.cn: 较小的机组直接装在贮气罐上.

sentences.en: When he sees me, he has just let down the receiver.
sentences.cn: 当他看见我的时候, 他就放下了听筒.

words.tran_cn: 被一般承认的；被认为标准的
收到；接受；迎接（receive的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: [电]红外线接收机；红外探测器
接收器电路；收音机电路
n. 接收单元；受话装置

trans.tran_cn: 听筒，收音机，财产管理人，接收者，购买赃物的人，前传球接球手，破产接管人
trans.tran_en: A receiver is the part of a radio or television that picks up signals and converts them into sound or pictures
